page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT.WOOKEY HOLE SHOP.
page.content:
ACCORDING TO A SMALL SAMPLE SURVEY,THE MAJORITY OF THE PEOPLE OF WOOKEY HOLE AREA TEND TO BE EMPLOYED WITHIN THREE MILES OF THEIR HOME. MOST USE A CAR TO TRAVEL TO WORK; OTHERS WALK OR CYCLE,FEW USE A 'BUS.
THE VILLAGE SHOP IS VERY MUCH A CENTRE OF COMMUNITY LIFE; THE NEW OWNERS FIND THE WORK ENTAILS LONG HOURS, BUT ENJOY THE FRIENDLINESS AND COMPANY OF THEIR CUSTOMERS.THEY PAY TRIBUTE TO THE HONESTY OF LOCAL PEOPLE WHO RETURN EXTRA CHANGE GIVEN IN ERROR. NOT ONLY IS THE STORE-POST OFFICE VALUABLE FOR ITS RETAIL SERVICES BUT AS THE CENTRE OF INFORMATION FOR STRANGERS, AND NEWS DISSEMINATION FOR THE WHOLE LOCALITY.
